h4.p: [21] ``etaṃ bījaṃ kasi khettaṃ, petānaṃ dāyakassa ca.
[22] taṃ petā paribhuñjanti, dātā puññena vaḍḍhati..
[22] saggañca kamati {gamati (ka0)} ṭṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ katvāna bhaddaka''nti..
[22] mukhaṃ te sūkarasseva, kiṃ kammamakarī pure'' {makarā pure (ka0)}..
[22] tena metādiso vaṇṇo, yathā passasi nārada..
[21] ``taṃ ^a^M0.0128^ea^ tyāhaṃ {tāhaṃ (ka0)} nārada brūmi, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ tayā.
[22] mākāsi ^a^T0.0158^ea^ mukhasā pāpaṃ, mā kho sūkaramukho ahū''ti..
[21] ``dibbaṃ subhaṃ dhāresi vaṇṇadhātuṃ, vehāyasaṃ tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe.
[22] mukhañca te kimayo pūtigandhaṃ, khādanti kiṃ kammamakāsi pubbe''..
[21] ``samaṇo ahaṃ pāpotiduṭṭhavāco {pāpo duṭṭhavāco (sī0), pāpo dukkhavāco (syā0 pī0)}, tapassirūpo mukhasā asaññato.
[22] laddhā ca me tapasā vaṇṇadhātu, mukhañca me pesuṇiyena pūti..
[22] pubbapete ca ārabbha, atha vā vatthudevatā..
[22] te ^a^T0.0159^ea^ ceva pūjitā honti, dāyakā ca anipphalā..
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0129^ea^ hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā caññā paridevanā.
[22] na taṃ petassa atthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo..
[21] {khu0 pā0 7.1 khuddakapāṭhe} ``tirokuṭṭesu {tirokuḍḍesu (sī0 syā0 pī0)} tiṭṭhanti, sandhisiṅghāṭakesu ca.
[22] na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā..
[22] `idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo'..
[21] ```ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase.
[22] amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā'..
[21] ```na hi tattha kasi atthi, gorakkhettha na vijjati.
[27] vaṇijjā tādisī natthi, hiraññena kayākayaṃ {kayokkayaṃ (sī0 ka0) kayokayaṃ (khu0 pā0 7.6)}.
[22] ito ^a^T0.0160^ea^ dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā {kālakatā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} tahiṃ'..
[21] ```adāsi ^a^M0.0130^ea^ me akāsi me, ñāti mittā {ñāti mitto (?)} sakhā ca me.
[21] ```na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā caññā paridevanā.
[22] na taṃ petānamatthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo'..
[21] ``so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito, petāna pūjā ca katā uḷārā.
[22] balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka''nti..
[22] makkhikāhi parikiṇṇā {makkhikāparikiṇṇā ca (sī0)}, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī''ti..
[22] vijāyitvāna khādāmi, tepi nā honti me alaṃ..
[22] pānīyaṃ na labhe pātuṃ, passa maṃ byasanaṃ gata''nti..
[21] ``kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[21] ``sapatī {sapattī (sī0)} me gabbhinī āsi, tassā pāpaṃ acetayiṃ.
[27] tadassā mātā kupitā, mayhaṃ ñātī samānayi.
[22] sapathañca maṃ kāresi, paribhāsāpayī ca maṃ..
[22] puttamaṃsāni khādāmi, sace taṃ pakataṃ mayā..
[22] makkhikāhi ^a^T0.0162^ea^ parikiṇṇā, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī''ti..
[22] vijāyitvāna khādāmi, tepi nā honti me alaṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[22] sā ca gabbhaṃ alabhittha, tassā pāpaṃ acetayiṃ..
[22] sapathañca maṃ kāresi, paribhāsāpayī ca maṃ..
[21] ``na hi annena pānena, mato goṇo samuṭṭhahe.
[22] tvaṃsi bālo ca {bālova (ka0)} dummedho, yathā taññova dummatī''ti..
[21] ``ime pādā idaṃ sīsaṃ, ayaṃ kāyo savāladhi.
[22] nettā tatheva tiṭṭhanti, ayaṃ goṇo samuṭṭhahe..
[22] vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ..
[22] na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava'..
[21] evaṃ ^a^M0.0133^ea^ karonti sappaññā, ye honti anukampakā.
[21] ``gūthañca ^a^T0.0164^ea^ ^a^V0.0097^ea^ ^a^P0.0008^ea^ muttaṃ ruhirañca pubbaṃ, paribhuñjati kissa ayaṃ vipāko.
[22] ayaṃ nu kiṃ kammamakāsi nārī, yā sabbadā lohitapubbabhakkhā..
[21] ``navāni vatthāni subhāni ceva, mudūni suddhāni ca lomasāni.
[22] dinnāni missā kitakā {kiṭakā (ka0)} bhavanti, ayaṃ nu kiṃ kammamakāsi nārī''ti..
[21] ``bhariyā mamesā ahū bhadante, adāyikā maccharinī kadariyā.
[22] sā maṃ dadantaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ, akkosati ca paribhāsati ca..
[21] ```gūthañca muttaṃ ruhirañca pubbaṃ, paribhuñja tvaṃ asuciṃ sabbakālaṃ.
[27] etaṃ te paralokasmiṃ hotu, vatthā ca te kiṭakasamā bhavantu'.
[22] etādisaṃ duccaritaṃ caritvā, idhāgatā cirarattāya khādatī''ti..
[22] kesehamhi paṭicchannā, puññaṃ me appakaṃ kata''nti..
[27] idaṃ dussaṃ nivāsetvā, ehi nikkhama sobhane.
[21] ``hatthena hatthe te dinnaṃ, na mayhaṃ upakappati.
[21] samanantarānuddiṭṭhe ^a^V0.0098^ea^ {samanantarā anuddiṭṭhe (syā0 ka0)}, vipāko udapajjatha {upapajjatha (sī0 syā0)}.
[22] bhojanacchādanapānīyaṃ {bhojanacchādanaṃ pānīyaṃ (syā0 ka0)}, dakkhiṇāya idaṃ phalaṃ..
[21] {ma0 ni0 3.250, 267; a0 ni0 3.36; pe0 va0 240, 693} ``catukkaṇṇaṃ catudvāraṃ, vibhattaṃ bhāgaso mitaṃ.
[21] ``puratova ^a^P0.0011^ea^ {purato ca (syā0)} setena paleti hatthinā, majjhe pana assatarīrathena.
[22] pacchā ca kaññā sivikāya nīyati, obhāsayantī dasa sabbato {sabbato (ka0)} disā..
[22] manussabhūtā ^a^T0.0167^ea^ kimakattha pāpaṃ, yenaññamaññassa pivātha lohita''nti..
[21] ``puratova yo gacchati kuñjarena, setena nāgena catukkamena.
[22] amhāka putto ahu jeṭṭhako so {sova jeṭṭho (ka0)}, dānāni datvāna sukhī pamodati..
[21] ``yo ^a^V0.0099^ea^ so majjhe assatarīrathena, catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena.
[22] amhāka putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharī dānavatī virocati..
[21] ``yā sā ca pacchā sivikāya nīyati, nārī sapaññā migamandalocanā.
[22] amhāka dhītā ahu sā kaniṭṭhikā, bhāgaḍḍhabhāgena sukhī pamodati..
[21] ``ete ^a^M0.0136^ea^ ca dānāni adaṃsu pubbe, pasannacittā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
[27] mayaṃ pana maccharino ahumha, paribhāsakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
[22] ete ca datvā paricārayanti, mayañca ^a^T0.0168^ea^ sussāma naḷova chinno''ti {khittoti (sī0)}..
[21] ``kiṃ tumhākaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ sayānaṃ, kathañca yāpetha supāpadhammino.
[22] pahūtabhogesu anappakesu, sukhaṃ virādhāya {virāgāya (syā0 ka0)} dukkhajja pattā''ti..
[22] bahuṃ pitvā na dhātā homa, nacchādimhase {naruccādimhase (ka0)} mayaṃ..
[21] ``icceva maccā paridevayanti, adāyakā pecca {maccharino (ka0)} yamassa ṭhāyino.
[22] ye te vidicca {viditvā (sī0)} adhigamma bhoge, na bhuñjare nāpi karonti puññaṃ..
[21] ``te ^a^P0.0012^ea^ khuppipāsūpagatā parattha, pacchā {petā (sī0)} ciraṃ jhāyare ḍayhamānā.
[22] kammāni katvāna dukhudrāni, anubhonti dukkhaṃ kaṭukapphalāni..
[21] ``ittaraṃ hi dhanaṃ dhaññaṃ, ittaraṃ idha jīvitaṃ.
[22] ittaraṃ ittarato ñatvā, dīpaṃ kayirātha paṇḍito..
[21] ``ye te evaṃ pajānanti, narā dhammassa kovidā.
[22] te dāne nappamajjanti, sutvā arahataṃ vaco''ti..
[22] evaṃ sarīre nibbhoge, pete kālaṅkate sati..
[22] tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gati''..
[22] yathāgato tathā gato, tattha kā {kā tattha (sī0)} paridevanā..
[22] tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gati''..
[21] ``sace rode kisā assaṃ, tattha me kiṃ phalaṃ siyā.
[22] tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gati''..
[22] tasmā etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gati''..
[22] tasmā ^a^T0.0170^ea^ etaṃ na rodāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī''ti..
[21] khettañca sūkaraṃ pūti, piṭṭhaṃ cāpi tirokuṭṭaṃ.
[22] upphāsulike {uppāsuḷike (ka0)} kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī''ti..
[21] ``kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[21] ``anukampakā mayhaṃ nāhesuṃ bhante, pitā ca mātā athavāpi ñātakā.
[22] ye maṃ niyojeyyuṃ dadāhi dānaṃ, pasannacittā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ..
[21] ``ito ahaṃ vassasatāni pañca, yaṃ evarūpā vicarāmi naggā.
[22] khudāya ^a^T0.0171^ea^ taṇhāya ca khajjamānā, pāpassa kammassa phalaṃ mamedaṃ..
[21] ``vandāmi taṃ ayya pasannacittā, anukampa maṃ vīra mahānubhāva.
[22] datvā ca me ādisa yaṃ hi kiñci, mocehi maṃ duggatiyā bhadante''ti..
[22] obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi ^a^V0.0102^ea^ taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ^a^T0.0172^ea^ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] muni kāruṇiko loke, taṃ maṃ addakkhi duggataṃ..
[22] sāhaṃ taṃ paridahāmi, yaṃ yaṃ hi manaso piyaṃ..
[22] upphāsulike kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasi''..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^P0.0018^ea^ te sakiyā mātā, pubbe aññāsu jātīsu.
[21] ``dehi puttaka me dānaṃ, datvā anvādisāhi me.
[21] catasso kuṭiyo katvā, saṅghe cātuddise adā.
[22] bhojanaṃ pānīyaṃ vatthaṃ, dakkhiṇāya idaṃ phalaṃ..
[22] obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[22] upphāsulike ^a^T0.0175^ea^ kisike, kā nu tvaṃ idha tiṭṭhasī''ti..
[21] ``ahaṃ mattā tuvaṃ tissā, sapattī te pure ahuṃ.
[21] ``kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[21] ``caṇḍī ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^a^P0.0020^ea^ ca pharusā cāsiṃ, issukī maccharī saṭhā {saṭhī (sī0)}.
[22] tāhaṃ duruttaṃ vatvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā''ti..
[21] sabbaṃ {saccaṃ (ka0)} ahampi jānāmi, yathā tvaṃ caṇḍikā ahu.
[22] aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi paṃsukunthitā''ti..
[22] ahañca kho {kho taṃ (sī0 ka0)} adhimattaṃ, samalaṅkatatarā tayā..
[22] tato me issā vipulā, kodho me samajāyatha..
[21] ``tato paṃsuṃ gahetvāna, paṃsunā taṃ hi okiriṃ {taṃ vikīrihaṃ (syā0 ka0)}.
[22] aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kena khajjasi kacchuyā''ti..
[21] ``saccaṃ ^a^V0.0105^ea^ ahampi jānāmi, seyyaṃ me tvaṃ samokiri.
[22] aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi naggiyā tuva''nti..
[22] tvañca āmantitā āsi, sasāminī no ca kho ahaṃ..
[21] ``saccaṃ ahampi jānāmi, dussaṃ me tvaṃ apānudi.
[22] aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi gūthagandhinī''ti..
[27] gūthakūpe adhāresiṃ {adhāresiṃ (ka0)}, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā.
[21] ``saccaṃ ahampi jānāmi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā.
[22] aññañca kho taṃ pucchāmi, kenāsi duggatā tuva''nti..
[21] ``ubhinnaṃ samakaṃ āsi, yaṃ gehe vijjate dhanaṃ.
[22] na hi pāpehi kammehi, sulabhā hoti suggatī'''ti..
[21] ``vāmato maṃ tvaṃ paccesi, athopi maṃ usūyasi.
[22] passa ^a^T0.0177^ea^ pāpānaṃ kammānaṃ, vipāko hoti yādiso..
[21] ``te gharā tā ca dāsiyo {te gharadāsiyo āsuṃ (sī0 syā0), te ghare dāsiyo ceva (ka0)}, tānevābharaṇānime.
[22] te aññe paricārenti, na bhogā honti sassatā..
[22] appeva te dade kiñci, mā su tāva ito agā''ti..
[21] ``handa kiṃ vā tyāhaṃ {kiṃ tyāhaṃ (sī0 syā0), kiṃ vatāhaṃ (ka0)} dammi, kiṃ vā tedha {kiṃ vā ca te (sī0 syā0), kiṃ vidha te (ka0)} karomahaṃ.
[22] obhāsentī ^a^T0.0178^ea^ disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[21] ``ahaṃ mattā tuvaṃ tissā, sapattī te pure ahuṃ.
[27] cīraṃ jīvāhi bhagini, saha sabbehi ñātibhi.
[22] vineyya maccheramalaṃ samūlaṃ, aninditā saggamupehi ṭhāna''nti..
[22] piṅgalāsi kaḷārāsi, na taṃ maññāmi mānusi''nti..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^V0.0107^ea^ nandā nandisena, bhariyā te pure ahuṃ.
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^T0.0179^ea^ ^a^M0.0145^ea^ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ.
[21] ``caṇḍī ca pharusā cāsiṃ {caṇḍī pharusavācā ca (sī0)}, tayi cāpi agāravā.
[22] tāhaṃ duruttaṃ vatvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā''ti..
[21] ``handuttarīyaṃ dadāmi te, imaṃ {idaṃ (sī0 aṭṭha0)} dussaṃ nivāsaya.
[22] imaṃ dussaṃ nivāsetvā, ehi nessāmi taṃ gharaṃ..
[22] putte ca te passissasi, suṇisāyo ca dakkhasī''ti..
[21] ``hatthena hatthe te dinnaṃ, na mayhaṃ upakappati.
[22] chattaṃ gandhañca mālañca, vividhā ca upāhanā..
[22] obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā..
[21] ``kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati.
[22] uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[21] ``pucchāmi ^a^M0.0146^ea^ taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ.
[22] kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī''ti..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^V0.0108^ea^ nandā nandisena, bhariyā te pure ahuṃ.
[27] ciraṃ jīva gahapati, saha sabbehi ñātibhi.
[22] vineyya maccheramalaṃ samūlaṃ, anindito saggamupehi ṭhāna''nti..
[22] bāhā paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe kiṃ dukkhito tuva''nti..
[22] tassa cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahāmi jīvita''nti..
[21] ``sovaṇṇamayaṃ maṇimayaṃ, lohitakamayaṃ {lohitaṅgamayaṃ (syā0), lohitaṅkamayaṃ (sī0), lohamayaṃ (katthaci)} atha rūpiyamayaṃ.
[22] ācikkha me bhaddamāṇava, cakkayugaṃ paṭipādayāmi te''ti..
[21] so ^a^M0.0147^ea^ māṇavo tassa pāvadi, ``candasūriyā ubhayettha dissare.
[22] sovaṇṇamayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatī''ti..
[21] ``bālo kho tvaṃ asi māṇava, yo tvaṃ patthayase apatthiyaṃ.
[22] maññāmi tuvaṃ marissasi, na hi tvaṃ lacchasi candasūriye''ti..
[22] peto kālakato na dissati, ko nidha kandataṃ bālyataro''ti..
[21] ``saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇava, ahameva kandataṃ bālyataro.
[22] candaṃ viya dārako rudaṃ, petaṃ kālakatābhipatthayi''nti..
[22] vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ..
[21] ``abbahī {abbūḷhaṃ (syā0 ka0)} vata me sallaṃ, sokaṃ hadayanissitaṃ.
[22] na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā''ti..
[22] ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti..
[21] ``yañca kandasi yañca rodasi, puttaṃ āḷāhane sayaṃ dahitvā.
[22] svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato''ti..
[21] ``appaṃ ^a^M0.0148^ea^ vā bahuṃ vā nāddasāma, dānaṃ dadantassa sake agāre.
[22] uposathakammaṃ vā tādisaṃ, kena kammena gatosi devaloka''nti..
[22] buddhaṃ vigatarajaṃ vitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ, addakkhiṃ sugataṃ anomapaññaṃ..
[22] tāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvāna kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato''ti..
[21] ``acchariyaṃ vata abbhutaṃ vata, añjalikammassa ayamīdiso vipāko.
[22] ahampi muditamano pasannacitto, ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāmī''ti..
[21] ``ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāhi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto.
[22] tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu..
[22] amajjapo mā ca musā bhaṇāhi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho''ti..
[22] karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamāti..
[22] amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi. sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho''ti..
[21] ``uṭṭhehi ^a^P0.0025^ea^ kaṇha kiṃ sesi, ko attho supanena te.
[27] yo ca tuyhaṃ sako bhātā, hadayaṃ cakkhu ca {cakkhuṃva (aṭṭha0)} dakkhiṇaṃ.
[22] tassa vātā balīyanti, sasaṃ jappati {ghaṭo jappati (ka0)} kesavā''ti..
[22] candato sasamicchāmi, taṃ me ohara kesavā''ti..
[22] kasmā ^a^T0.0182^ea^ pure mataṃ puttaṃ, ajjāpi manusocasi..
